Amaretto Sour.name: Amaretto Sour
Amaretto Sour.description: A sweet and sour mix featuring Amaretto, bourbon, and lemon juice, shaken vigorously with egg white for foamy top.
Amaretto Sour.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 1.5 oz Amaretto Liqueur
  * 0.75 oz Bourbon
  * Juice from 1 Lemon
  * 1 tsp Rich Simple Syrup
  * 1 Egg White



## Instructions

  1. Dry-shake all ingredients.
  2. Add ice and shake again.
  3. Strain into glass and serve.

Aperol Spritz.name: Aperol Spritz
Aperol Spritz.description: A light and bubbly Italian aperitivo made with Aperol, prosecco, and soda water. Refreshing and low in alcohol.
Aperol Spritz.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 3 oz Prosecco
  * 2 oz Aperol
  * 1 oz Club Soda
  * Garnish with an Orange slice



## Instructions

  1. Fill a wine glass with ice.
  2. Add prosecco, then Aperol.
  3. Top with club soda.
  4. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.

Basil Smash.name: Basil Smash
Basil Smash.description: A herbaceous drink combining gin, triple sec, lime juice, and fresh basil leaves.
Basil Smash.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Gin
  * 1 oz Triple Sec
  * 0.75 oz Simple Syrup
  * Juice from 1 Lime
  * 5 Basil Leaves



## Instructions

  1. Muddle basil with lime juice and syrup.
  2. Add gin and triple sec.
  3. Shake with ice, strain, and serve.

Caipirinha.name: Caipirinha
Caipirinha.description: Brazil's national cocktail, made with lime, sugar, and cachaça or rum.
Caipirinha.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Cachaça
  * 1 Lime, sliced
  * 2 tsp Sugar



## Instructions

  1. Muddle lime slices with sugar in a glass.
  2. Add ice and cachaça.
  3. Stir well and serve.

Campari & Tonic.name: Campari & Tonic
Campari & Tonic.description: A simple yet bold drink combining the bitter notes of Campari with the crispness of tonic water.
Campari & Tonic.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Campari
  * Top with Tonic Water



## Instructions

  1. Fill glass with ice.
  2. Add Campari and top with tonic.
  3. Stir lightly and serve.

Chocolate Rocket.name: Chocolate Rocket
Chocolate Rocket.description: An Old Fashioned with a twist, featuring chocolate bitters and rucolino liqueur for a rich, complex flavor.
Chocolate Rocket.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 1 oz Whiskey
  * 1 oz Dark Rum
  * 0.5 oz Rucolino Liqueur
  * 0.5 oz Simple Syrup
  * Dashes of Chocolate Bitters
  * Garnish with Orange Twist



## Instructions

  1. Stir all ingredients with ice.
  2. Strain into rocks glass.
  3. Garnish and serve.

Cuba Libra.name: Cuba Libra
Cuba Libra.description: A simple, refreshing mix of rum and coke, perfect for any party.
Cuba Libra.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Rum
  * Coke to top up
  * Garnish with Lime Wedge



## Instructions

  1. Fill glass with ice.
  2. Add rum, top with Coke.
  3. Garnish and serve.

Gin & Tonic.name: Gin & Tonic
Gin & Tonic.description: A classic drink with a twist, adding lemon juice and a sprig of rosemary to the traditional gin and tonic.
Gin & Tonic.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Gin
  * Juice from 1 Lemon
  * 1 sprig Rosemary
  * Top with Tonic Water



## Instructions

  1. Fill glass with ice.
  2. Add gin and lemon juice.
  3. Stir in rosemary, top with tonic, garnish with sprig.

Gin Lemon Sidecar.name: Gin Lemon Sidecar
Gin Lemon Sidecar.description: A citrusy cocktail with gin, triple sec, and lemon juice, enhanced with a dash of orange bitters.
Gin Lemon Sidecar.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Gin
  * 1 oz Triple Sec
  * 0.75 oz Simple Syrup
  * Juice from 1 Lemon
  * Dash of Orange Bitters



## Instructions

  1. Shake all ingredients with ice.
  2. Strain into coupe or cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish as desired.

Jalapeño Margarita.name: Jalapeño Margarita
Jalapeño Margarita.description: A spicy version of the classic Margarita, with jalapeño and basil leaves adding a flavorful kick.
Jalapeño Margarita.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Tequila
  * 1 oz Triple Sec
  * Juice from 1 Lemon
  * 5 Basil Leaves
  * 1 slice Jalapeño
  * Agave Syrup to taste



## Instructions

  1. Muddle basil and jalapeño with lemon juice and syrup.
  2. Add tequila and triple sec.
  3. Shake, strain, serve over ice.

Long Island Iced Tea.name: Long Island Iced Tea
Long Island Iced Tea.description: A potent combination of vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple sec, and coke, sweetened with lemon juice.
Long Island Iced Tea.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 0.5 oz each of:
  * Vodka
  * Gin
  * Rum
  * Tequila
  * Triple Sec
  * 0.75 oz Simple Syrup
  * Juice from 1 Lemon
  * Coke to top up



## Instructions

  1. Combine all spirits and mixers with ice.
  2. Shake well and strain over fresh ice.
  3. Top with Coke and stir lightly.

Mai Tai.name: Mai Tai
Mai Tai.description: A tropical delight featuring rum, orange curacao or Grand Marnier, orgeat syrup, and lime juice.
Mai Tai.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 1.5 oz Rum
  * 0.75 oz Orange Curaçao or Grand Marnier
  * 0.5 oz Orgeat Syrup
  * Juice from 1 Lime



## Instructions

  1. Shake all ingredients with ice.
  2. Strain into tiki mug or rocks glass.
  3. Garnish with mint, lime, or cherry.

Mamajito.name: Mamajito
Mamajito.description: A lighter version of the traditional Mojito, using Sprite Zero instead of club soda.
Mamajito.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Rum
  * 5 Mint Leaves
  * Top with Sprite Zero
  * Garnish with Lime Wedge



## Instructions

  1. Muddle mint.
  2. Add rum and ice.
  3. Top with Sprite Zero, stir, and serve.

Manhattan.name: Manhattan
Manhattan.description: A sophisticated mix of rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and Angostura bitters, garnished with a maraschino cherry.
Manhattan.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Rye Whiskey
  * 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
  * Few dashes Angostura Bitters
  * Garnish with Maraschino Cherry



## Instructions

  1. Stir all ingredients with ice.
  2. Strain into a chilled coupe.
  3. Garnish with cherry.

Margarita.name: Margarita
Margarita.description: The classic tequila cocktail with triple sec and lime juice, sweetened with agave syrup.
Margarita.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Tequila
  * 1 oz Triple Sec
  * Juice from 1 Lime
  * Agave Syrup to taste



## Instructions

  1. Shake all ingredients with ice.
  2. Strain into salt-rimmed glass.
  3. Serve with lime wedge.

Mojito.name: Mojito
Mojito.description: A refreshing mix of rum, mint, simple syrup, and club soda.
Mojito.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Rum
  * 5 Mint Leaves
  * 1 oz Simple Syrup
  * Top with Club Soda
  * Garnish with Lime Wedge



## Instructions

  1. Muddle mint with syrup.
  2. Add rum and ice.
  3. Top with club soda, stir, garnish.

Moscow Mule.name: Moscow Mule
Moscow Mule.description: A crisp vodka drink with ginger beer and a touch of mint.
Moscow Mule.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Vodka
  * Top with Ginger Beer
  * Garnish with Mint Leaves and Lime Wedge



## Instructions

  1. Add vodka to copper mug with ice.
  2. Top with ginger beer.
  3. Garnish and serve.

Negroni.name: Negroni
Negroni.description: A strong, balanced cocktail with equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth, garnished with orange peel.
Negroni.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 1 oz Gin
  * 1 oz Campari
  * 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
  * Garnish with Orange Peel



## Instructions

  1. Stir all ingredients with ice.
  2. Strain into rocks glass over fresh ice.
  3. Garnish with orange peel.

Old Fashioned.name: Old Fashioned
Old Fashioned.description: A timeless bourbon cocktail sweetened with simple syrup and enhanced with Angostura bitters and a hint of orange.
Old Fashioned.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Bourbon
  * 1 oz Simple Syrup
  * 0.5 oz Water
  * Few dashes Angostura Bitters
  * Garnish with Orange Peel



## Instructions

  1. Stir bourbon, syrup, water, and bitters over ice.
  2. Strain into glass over fresh ice.
  3. Garnish with orange peel.

Rabo de Galo.name: Rabo de Galo
Rabo de Galo.description: A Brazilian cocktail with a mix of cachaça, sweet vermouth, Cynar, and a hint of orange bitters.
Rabo de Galo.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 1.5 oz Cachaça
  * 0.75 oz Sweet Vermouth
  * 0.75 oz Cynar
  * Dash of Orange Bitters



## Instructions

  1. Stir all ingredients with ice.
  2. Strain into glass.
  3. Serve neat or over a single cube.

The Barbie.name: The Barbie
The Barbie.description: A playful gin-based cocktail with watermelon liqueur and lemon juice, perfect for a summer evening.
The Barbie.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Gin
  * 1 oz Watermelon Liqueur
  * 0.75 oz Simple Syrup
  * Juice from 1 Lemon



## Instructions

  1. Shake all ingredients with ice.
  2. Strain into glass.
  3. Garnish and serve.

The Blue French Horn.name: The Blue French Horn
The Blue French Horn.description: A visually striking drink with gin, blue curacao, and lemon juice.
The Blue French Horn.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Gin
  * 1 oz Blue Curaçao
  * 0.75 oz Simple Syrup
  * Juice from 1 Lemon



## Instructions

  1. Shake all ingredients with ice.
  2. Strain into glass.
  3. Garnish if desired.

The Lily Pad.name: The Lily Pad
The Lily Pad.description: A refreshing blend of gin, mint, lime juice, and tonic, ideal for cooling down on a hot day.
The Lily Pad.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Gin
  * Juice from 1 Lime
  * 0.5 oz Simple Syrup
  * 4–5 Mint Leaves
  * Top with Tonic Water



## Instructions

  1. Add gin, lime juice, and syrup to a shaker with ice.
  2. Muddle mint leaves and add.
  3. Shake and strain into a glass.
  4. Top with tonic water and serve.

The Schmosby.name: The Schmosby
The Schmosby.description: A fruity twist on the classic Margarita, with the addition of clementine juice alongside tequila and lime.
The Schmosby.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 2 oz Tequila
  * 1 oz Triple Sec
  * Juice from 1 Lime
  * Juice from 1 Clementine
  * Agave Syrup to taste



## Instructions

  1. Shake all ingredients with ice.
  2. Strain and serve with citrus garnish.

Tinto de Verano.name: Tinto de Verano
Tinto de Verano.description: A light and refreshing drink made with wine, vermouth, and club soda, perfect for a summer afternoon.
Tinto de Verano.source_text:
## Ingredients

  * 1 part Wine
  * 1 part Vermouth
  * Club Soda to top
  * Garnish with Orange Slice



## Instructions

  1. Mix wine and vermouth over ice.
  2. Top with club soda.
  3. Stir gently and garnish.
